item.title: Trump Drops Tariff Threats Over Greenland After Meeting With NATO Chief
item.description: Hours after his address to the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, on Wednesday, President Trump said he had reached a framework agreement with the leader of NATO over the future of Greenland. ]]>

item.title: Trump Confuses Iceland and Greenland in Davos Remarks
item.description: A protest against President Trump for his threats to take over Greenland in the territory’s capital, Nuuk, on Saturday. Mr. Trump has repeatedly confused Greenland with Iceland, its North Atlantic neighbor. ]]>

item.title: Few Voters Say Trump’s Second Term Has Made the Country Better, Poll Finds
item.description:
A majority of voters said that Mr. Trump had focused on the wrong priorities and that they disapproved of his handling of top issues, but the president still enjoys strong support from Republicans.

]]>

item.title: Murder Rate Drops to Lowest Level Since at Least 1900, New Report Says
item.description:
A decline in homicides across the country was a stunning reversal after crime rose during the pandemic.

]]>
